Field # 6 and 7 form a related multi-value set.

t.desc:
Files that need to exist for effective
installation of the application in the ID. Field # 6 and 7 form a related multi-value set.
There is a mainline program called INSTALL.SYS.RECS that generates a report using this application. This program checks if the given transaction codes, account.classes exist in the system and produces a report in HOLD.CONTROL - CHECKLIST.OF.COMPULSORY.RECS, which lists whether the transaction codes, account.classes have been created or not. A similar check is done for files defined in the field FILE.NAME. If they don't exist, then the record fatals out of T24. If the files exist, then the system checks if the necessary records have been created.
Validation Rules:
A valid T24 Application name.
A maximum of 25 characters may be entered.
